data.comment: I think every one can complete this course easily by taking guide help and searching a few websites on internet. I'am thankfull to Ameyem Skills for such a wonderful program
My suggestion for the guide is to see the task immediately and give quick review. This is quite exciting to learn with Ameyem Skills. Looking farword to learn more.
If some more examples are given it would be easy for understanding.
Before entering into each task give a pdf for all types syntaxes related to the chapter. Great experience while learning.
Every thing is good on this online training. It's a new kind and will look farword in learning. Apart from this, I expected an excel sheet is included while doing a project.
